name: Monsteria
description: Introducing a hysterical top-down shooter. Challenge your way through 7+ randomized levels, brimming with hordes of bizarre monsters. Upgrade your character through a selection of 30 unique powerups and minions, unlock special classes and much much more. Monsteria is chaotic fun for everyone.
minimum_requirements: OS: xp Processor: 1.4 GHz Memory: 300 MB RAM Graphics: Anything not too old Storage: 193 MB available space Sound Card: Not required
